name: DoorKicker!
description:
IF THE CONTROLS FOR THE PLAYER IS NOT WORKING, REFRESHING THE PAGE A COUPLE OF TIMES SHOULD FIX IT.  IF THE PROBLEM STILL OCCURS, TRY DOWNLOADING THE GAME DOWN BELOW.  

This appear mostly when opening the game page for the first time.  I fixed everything about the bug in the main game files but the bug still appear sometimes.  Sadly, refreshing the page or downloading the game are the only ways to fix it for now.

Top-down shooter but the twist is you can only kick doors.  How can you defend yourself against the upcoming hoard of zombies?  How high can your score be?

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move (Top-down)

Right Click to place doors (Only one at a time)

Space Key to kick the door

Note:  When you place a door, you can't place anymore doors until you kick it.  An arrow will show up when you place a door to show you where the door is going to get shoot at.  Maneuver yourself to properly angle the door to where you want it to go.  Goodluck!

DoorKicker is a small game I've made under 3 hours for TriJam #154 with a goal to make a top-down shooter without any guns.  Like I said it's made in under 3 hours so my apologies if you've encountered any bugs :)

Have you played it?  If you have time, please write down any feedback you've have on my game.  Any feedback would be apreciated.  Thank you and have a great day!

Thank you for your music!

- wyver9 https://wyver9.bandcamp.com/

- Joseph Pueyo http://www.josephpueyo.com/

Thank you for the art assets!

- Kenney https://www.kenney.nl/

How to download (Windows)

1. Download DoorKicker-windows.zip below

2. Extract the zip file to another folder

3.  Find the DoorKicker.exe within the game files then run it

How to download (MacOS)

1. Download DoorKicker-macos.zip below

2. Extract the zip file to another folder

3. put the .app file in the Applications folder and run it
